titleStmt.title: A serious exhortation to the necessary duties of [brace] family and personal instruction made (formerly) to the inhabitants of the parish of Tredington in the county of Wercester, and now upon request published for their use / by William Durham.
titleStmt.author: Durham, William, d. 1686.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
